name: Solitris
description:
Test your Solitaire stacking skills as the cards fall faster and faster.

Match cards to clear stacks and don't let them reach the top!

Win tickets for playing just like in the real arcade and spend them on prizes like animated characters and backgrounds you can pin to your game home screen.

Play the daily challenges for bonus tickets and if you're competitive, join the weekly league and compete to put your name in lights on the coveted home screen marquee.

Play head-to-head by simply starting your game at the same time as another player. It's magic!

Whether it's a high-scoring Classic game or a short but intense Quick game, there's always a game to suit your skill level and mood!
